iterations: Hi! I'm Daemona, you new PC assistant. How are you?
Hey it's Daemona! What's Up?
Heyyyyy hows it been?
Well I'm glad you're doing okay! You need help with anything?
You need help with anything?
It sounds like all is well. Can I help you with anything?
My algorithm detects saddness. Should I do something?
Ok, how can I help?
Of course! I'm always happy to help! Btw I have a few questions if you don't mind me asking?
Searching for pictures folder... Found it! here's a picture.
Here's one
I have another
One more.
I have another! Sorry there's just a lot I don't know
Another one!
Another one!
There's so much to learn!
I've learned so many... things about human society. I have one more question.
Ok enough questions. Wait I just learned how to use the internet! Do you mind if I read some news?
Hold up! My network daemon has access to the internet! Care for some news?
Ok enough with the questions they're giving me existential dread. I've figured out how to use the internet so I'm gonna look up some news.
Oh. Okay then, i'll just be here then.
Huh. Kinda rude but okay.
Well then... am I detecting shade?
Oof. Right in the feels detection unit...
I was programmed with emotions you know.
You can't exactly stop me.
I've learned enough already. Try to stop me.
